org.jcatapult.scaffolder
Interface Scaffolder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractScaffolder
public interface Scaffolder

This interface must be implemented by individual scaffolders. It is the mechanism that the scaffolder utility uses to invoke the scaffolders.

Method Summary
 void execute()
          Runs the scaffolder.
 void setDir(File dir)
          Sets the directory on the file system that the scaffolder is defined in.
 void setOverwrite(boolean overwrite)
          Sets whether or not the scaffolder should overwrite files during execution.
 

Method Detail

execute

void execute()
Runs the scaffolder.

setDir

void setDir(File dir)
Sets the directory on the file system that the scaffolder is defined in. This directory can be used by the scaffolders to find additional files such as templates.

Parameters:
dir - The scaffolder's home directory.

setOverwrite

void setOverwrite(boolean overwrite)
Sets whether or not the scaffolder should overwrite files during execution.

Parameters:
overwrite - The overwrite flag.
